did.unittitle: John J. Hinds collection 1969, 1983, and undated.
did.abstract: Ann Arbor, Mich. resident who was employed at The Detroit Edison Company. He was married to Gertrude Hinds and attended the Bethlehem United Church of Christ in Ann Arbor. The collection consists of a Detroit Edison Company employee photograph book and two publications of the Bethlehem United Church of Christ.

bioghist.p: John J. Hinds was born in 1905 and lived in Ann Arbor, Mich. He was employed at The Detroit Edison Company in the Electrical System Department and retired in 1969. He was married to Gertrude Hinds and had at least one son named Richard. The Hinds were members of the Bethlehem United Church of Christ in Ann Arbor.

scopecontent.p: The collection consists of a Detroit Edison Company employee photograph book, a copy of the book "Bethlehem 150", and a United Church directory detailing the church management and membership.
